segments.text: It's quite striking how focused the woman is on her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's really polishing that plate with the towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her back is turned, slightly angled away from the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink, it's just gushing water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a substantial puddle around her feet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One foot is clearly submerged in the cold water, yet her face is utterly blank.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost impressive, this level of concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she hears the running water at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Surely, she must feel the water pooling around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is streaming down the cabinet doors now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mess is going to be terrible to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She really has no clue about the chaos unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
